Prerequisite: 11th level, tiefling, fighter, Combat Challenge class feature

Benefit: Your infernal wrath can also be triggered by an enemy marked by you that hits an ally with an attack that doesn't include you as a target.

Update (4/9/2010)

Replace the Benefit entry with the following text: "Your infernal wrath can also be triggered by an enemy marked by you that hits an ally with an attack that doesn't include you as a target."

Published in Martial Power, page(s) 143.
